text: that's what I am looking for. tried several from the community boards, but chatbot doesn't seem to be sending events
<@U26BLKGE4> said it was due to the fact that it was an iframe
It's, but if we're talking about chatbot, then you're able to send a webhook or create a custom script in <http://node.to|node.js >and then to something in GTM, I don't see problem with it
thanks <@U01ASFZL4UA>. do you know if that gets done inside the chatbot as a custom action or a different method?
Inside chatbot, it's a step in chatbot builder. If you set: Q1 - Custom Code - Q2, this script will run between.
I had a same problem with triggering chat as a event in GTM, but for live chat
